AI Description: inq is a command-line tool for managing and querying inventory data in YAML format. It allows users to easily manipulate and search inventory data for system administration tasks.
Core Features: Create & Manage Inventory Data In Yaml Format, Query Inventory Data Using A Simple Command-Line Interface, Use Filters & Search Queries To Extract Specific Information, Facilitates System Administration Tasks Related To Inventory Management
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Other Computer & Information Sciences
